introHeadlinePrefix: Are you ready for a revolution in the logistics industry?
introDescription: Logisity is a peer-to-peer doorstep-to-doorstep app designed to simplify sending and receiving packages between people, whether for short or long distances.
step3: Install even if you are presented with a warning, it's a secured app
logisityAppDescription: Book and track deliveries with ease.
logisityPartnerDescription: Join our network to offer logistics services.
contactDescription: Have questions, feedback, or just want to chat? Reach out to us!
contactErrorMessage: Failed to send message. Try again.
